name: Rogue Reflections
description:
Delve into the labyrinth of your mind, on a journey to face dark reflections of the seven deadly sins within yourself.

I hope you enjoy this simplified dungeon diving rogue-lite!

---

Web Monetization

If a player with web monetization enabled is detected they will be notified at the camp screen, and they will unlock a special, early game, un-upgradable mirror that will allow the player some more variety in the early stages of the game.

---

Project written in TypeScript.

Almost all of the code and art was created by me with the exceptions of:

zzfx (re-implemented in TypeScript) used for the sound effects.
https://github.com/KilledByAPixel/ZzFX https://zzfx.3d2k.com/

tiny-canvas (re-implemented in TypeScript, and modified) used for WebGL rendering.
https://github.com/bitnenfer/tiny-canvas

Music by Andrey Sitkov
